item.title: Documentation As a Creative Force
item.author: Eric Griffis
item.description:
Docs for the template package are coming together nicely. Architectural details are starting to jump off the page, so I’m slowing down to fold them into the code.

More…

item.title: Winter 2020 Prospective
item.author: Eric Griffis
item.description:
I’ve decided to make a serious effort this year to start using this blog as a project catalog and public relations vehicle. There should be at least one place on the Internet I can point to as a portfolio that isn’t GitHub. So, in that spirit, here’s what the next few months are starting to look like.

More…
